Scenario: Only one seat with no ties for the winner.

OPL
1 seats
9 ballots cast
6 candidates

Pike,D    3 votes
Foster,D  2 votes
Deutsch,R 0 votes
Borg,R    2 votes
Jones,R   1 votes
Smith,I   1 votes

Winner [Pike,D]   -- First assigned and only one

Only the candidate with the top amout of votes wins.
